item.title: ELK Stack using Docker Compose
item.description: The Elastic Docker registry contains Docker images for all the products in the Elastic Stack: https://www.docker.elastic.co/. Run with docker compose To get the default distributions of Elasticsearch and Kibana up and running in Docker, you can use Docker Compose. Create a docker-compose.yml file for the Elastic Stack. The following example brings up a single node cluster and Kibana so you can see how things work. This all-in-one configuration is a handy way to bring up your first dev cluster.
